triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Multi-UAV systems are the primary platform for implementing the secure containment control scheme.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core technique used to solve coupled HJI equations and obtain optimal control policies.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Critic-only neural network structure is employed as the primary computational model for the RL method.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: Zero-sum graphical game framework is used to formulate the attack-defense problem.

triples.name: Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman equation
triples.relevance: Used in the attitude loop to obtain optimal feedback control law through solving HJB equations.

triples.name: Optimal control
triples.relevance: The paper addresses optimal distributed secure control policies through min-max optimization.

triples.name: Quadcopter
triples.relevance: Quadrotor experiments are conducted to validate the proposed secure containment control scheme.

triples.name: Zero-sum game
triples.relevance: Zero-sum game framework models the attack-defense process between secure controllers and malicious attackers.

triples.name: Cyberattack
triples.relevance: The paper addresses cyber attacks that manipulate control commands in multi-UAV systems.

triples.name: Fixed-time convergence
triples.relevance: Novel technique introduced to improve convergence rate of the RL algorithm.
